traits.name: Fluxbending Overcast {@recharge 5}
entries: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a {@dice d6} to determine the effect: 1-3. The blastseeker teleports, swapping places with a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. 4-6. The blastseeker and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8 damage) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:
